ygData.subject: Re: New to the trade...
ygData.msgSnippet: What pieces are you trying to sell? Most people I know dont even try till Banded stage. Just sell it all back to the merchants. A Mastersmith friend of mine
ygData.messageBody:
What pieces are you trying to sell? Most people I know dont even try till Banded stage. Just sell it all back to the merchants.

A Mastersmith friend of mine (138) stated what people are willing to pay for the new weapons wont cover the cost of making them, but that unless you get into a bidding war (Ive seen it) Banded goes on Tunare for 1 plat per AC, +1.

Shannyn


>>> Runepuck <runepuck@...> 11/03/99 05:25AM >>>
From: Runepuck <runepuck@...>

Hello all. I'm new to the trade of smithing and would like some info on
what to sell the pieces for. I've seen some radically different prices and
would like a general concensus of going rates.

Also, I've heard that you can now forge weapons. What skill is needed for
them and what supplies?

Thank you for your time,
Cyrodane of Tarew Marr
